recordType.name: BAM Account
recordType.a:description: The list of accounts managed by application
recordType.a:listViewTemplateExpr: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridLayoutColumns"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "First Name", field: "firstName", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_linkField"( links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"( label: rf!firstName, recordType: rp!type, identifier: rp!id ) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Last Name", field: "lastName", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayValue: rf!lastName, align: null ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Email", field: "email", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayValue: rf!email, align: null ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Mobile Number", field: "mobileNumber", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_integerField"( displayValue: rf!mobileNumber, align: "RIGHT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Pincode", field: "pincode", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_integerField"( displayValue: rf!pincode, align: "RIGHT" ) ) }, pageSize: 50, defaultSort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "firstName", ascending: fn!true() ), shadeAlternateRows: true )

a:detailViewCfg.a:uiExpr: #"_a-0000e3b8-2279-8000-9ba4-011c48011c48_136624"( BAM_Account: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:BAM}BAM_Account'( id: rf!id, firstName: rf!firstName, lastName:rf!lastName, email:rf!email, mobileNumber: rf!mobileNumber, identityProof: rf!identityProof, addressProof: rf!addressProof, typeOfAccount:rf!typeOfAccount, addressLine1: rf!addressLine1, addressLine2: rf!addressLine2, city:rf!city, state:rf!state, country: rf!country, pincode: rf!pincode), readOnly: true() )

a:relatedActionCfg.a:contextExpr:
{ BAM_Account: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:BAM}BAM_Account'( id:rf!id, firstName: rf!firstName, lastName: rf!lastName, email: rf!email, addressLine1: rf!addressLine1, addressLine2: rf!addressLine2, city: rf!city, country: rf!country, state: rf!state, pincode: rf!pincode, mobileNumber: rf!mobileNumber, typeOfAccount: rf!typeOfAccount, identityProof: rf!identityProof, addressProof: rf!addressProof ), cancel: null
